sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle } from '../../components/ui/Card'; import Button from '../../components/ui/Button'; import Input from '../../components/ui/Input'; import Modal from '../../components/ui/Modal'; import Badge from '../../components/ui/Badge'; import { Briefcase, Plus, Search, Filter, Eye, Edit, Trash2, Calendar, MapPin, DollarSign, Users, } from 'lucide-react'; const JobsPage = () => { const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(''); const [selectedJob, setSelectedJob] = useState(null); const [isDetailModalOpen, setIsDetailModalOpen] = useState(false); const [isAddModalOpen, setIsAddModalOpen] = useState(false); // Mock data - replace with actual API calls const jobs = [ { id: 1, name: 'Software Engineer', country: 'United States', positions: ['Frontend Developer', 'Backend Developer', 'Full Stack Developer'], fee: 0, status: 'published', deadline: '2024-03-15', description: 'We are looking for talented software engineers to join our team.', requirements: { experience: '2+ years', education: 'Bachelor\'s degree in Computer Science', skills: ['JavaScript', 'React', 'Node.js'], }, created_at: '2024-01-15', applications_count: 45, }, { id: 2, name: 'Data Scientist', country: 'Canada', positions: ['Senior Data Scientist', 'Junior Data Scientist'], fee: 50, status: 'published', deadline: '2024-02-28', description: 'Join our data science team and work on exciting machine learning projects.', requirements: { experience: '3+ years', education: 'Master\'s degree in Data Science or related field', skills: ['Python', 'Machine Learning', 'Statistics'], }, created_at: '2024-01-10', applications_count: 23, }, { id: 3, name: 'Product Manager', country: 'United Kingdom', positions: ['Product Manager'], fee: 25, status: 'draft', deadline: '2024-04-01', description: 'Lead product development and strategy for our innovative platform.', requirements: { experience: '5+ years', education: 'Bachelor\'s degree in Business or related field', skills: ['Product Management', 'Agile', 'Analytics'], }, created_at: '2024-01-20', applications_count: 8, }, ]; const filteredJobs = jobs.filter( (job) => job.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || job.country.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || job.positions.some(pos => pos.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase())) ); const handleViewDetails = (job) => { setSelectedJob(job); setIsDetailModalOpen(true); }; const getStatusBadge = (status) => { const variants = { published: 'success', draft: 'warning', archived: 'secondary', }; return {status}; }; return (
{/* Header */}

Jobs

Manage job listings and track applications.

{/* Search and Filters */}
setSearchTerm(e.target.value)} className="pl-10" />
{/* Jobs Grid */}
{filteredJobs.map((job) => (
{job.name}
{job.country}
{getStatusBadge(job.status)}
{/* Positions */}
{job.positions.map((position, index) => ( {position} ))}
{/* Fee */}
Fee: {job.fee === 0 ? 'Free' : `$${job.fee}`}
{/* Deadline */}
Deadline: {new Date(job.deadline).toLocaleDateString()}
{/* Applications */}
{job.applications_count} applications
{/* Actions */}
))}
{/* Job Detail Modal */} setIsDetailModalOpen(false)} title={selectedJob?.name} size="lg" > {selectedJob && (
{/* Job Info */}

{selectedJob.name}

{selectedJob.country}

{selectedJob.fee === 0 ? 'Free' : `$${selectedJob.fee}`}

{getStatusBadge(selectedJob.status)}

{new Date(selectedJob.deadline).toLocaleDateString()}

{selectedJob.applications_count} applications

{/* Positions */}
{selectedJob.positions.map((position, index) => ( {position} ))}
{/* Description */}

{selectedJob.description}

{/* Requirements */}
Experience: {selectedJob.requirements.experience}
Education: {selectedJob.requirements.education}
Skills:
{selectedJob.requirements.skills.map((skill, index) => ( {skill} ))}
{/* Actions */}
)} {/* Add Job Modal - Placeholder */} setIsAddModalOpen(false)} title="Add New Job" size="lg" >

Add job functionality would be implemented here with a form containing:

  • Job Name
  • Country
  • Positions (multiple selection)
  • Fee
  • Status
  • Deadline
  • Description
  • Requirements
); }; export default JobsPage;
